content.text:
# 22nd Japan Film Professional Awards

The  was the 22nd edition of the Japan Film Professional Awards. Films of 2012 which had not already won a major domestic film award were eligible. The ceremony took place on June 15, 2013, at Theatre Shinjuku in Tokyo.
Awards
*Best Film:
*Best Director: Kōji Wakamatsu (11:25 The Day He Chose His Own Fate, )
*Best Actress: Atsuko Maeda (Kueki Ressha)
*Best Actor: Arata Iura (11:25 The Day He Chose His Own Fate, Our Homeland)
*Best New Director:  (')
*Best New Producer: Kiki Sugino (')
*Special:  (In recognition of the theatre's achievements, which closed in March 2013.)
*Special: Naoko Otani (For Land of Hope and her longtime work.)
10 best films
#  (Yu Irie)
# Beyond Outrage (Takeshi Kitano)
# Ai to Makoto (Takashi Miike)
#  ()

# Himizu (Sion Sono)
#  (Kazuyuki Izutsu)

#  (Nobuhiko Obayashi)
